title: Lotsa vintage specimens
content:
[So perfect.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010185512/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/17208860@N00/sets/690970/) You have the specimens from foundries like ATF, H. C. Hansen, Stephenson & Blake, Nebiolo, Berthold, etc.

Found via Kottke.org
author: brampitoyo

comments.content: That's the one, Ricardo. Link fixed. I don't want to claim ownership of Romesh, but I originally linked to his set [back in March](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010185512/http:/www.typographi.com/001084.php) (yeah, it's hidden) when he uploaded some specimens of Granby.
